title: KDSPY Tutorial | Keyword Research Using KDSPY Pro for Amazon KDP

tactics.name: Keyword Filtering
tactics.description: Use KDSPY Pro to filter out high BSR outliers and focus on keywords with strong potential and low competition
steps: Input keyword into KDSPY Pro's keyword search tool
Analyze competition, popularity, and revenue potential
Remove top 3 outliers with extreme BSR numbers
caveats: Outliers may skew data if not removed
source_quotes: remove just by filtering here the last one 2 3 so they're what we call outliners

tactics.name: filter_high_bsr_books
tactics.description: Filter out books with high BSR rankings to focus on lower-competition keywords
steps: Analyze remaining books with under 150 reviews
caveats: May miss high-performing books with niche appeal
source_quotes: we wait for these to go up then what I'm going to do in a moment I'm going to get rid of those three that are just too high in regards to the BSR ranking

heuristics.name: Outlier Removal
heuristics.condition: If keyword has extreme BSR outliers, filter them out
source_quotes: remove just by filtering here the last one 2 3 so they're what we call outliners

heuristics.name: low_review_boost
heuristics.condition: If median reviews are less than 200, prioritize keywords
source_quotes: we can filter that get rid of one 2 3 then we can actually start to look at books that maybe have under 150 reviews
